column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Previous to this campaign , have you been politically involved ?
#Text=How will you apply your previous work/volunteer/life experience to serving your constituents ?
#Text=I became politically active when my children 's child care centre was threatened with closure 4 years ago .
#Text=I organized a group of parents from the Day Care and we were successful in preventing this closure .
#Text=This lead me to become involved in many other activities .
#Text=I think that having first hand experience working within the Health Care System will be a crucial part to my work as a Member of Parliament and making decisions when it comes to Health Care .
#Text=Being a woman and a mother also contributes to how I will make my decisions .
#Text=Finally I am a creative thinker .
#Text=I am always coming up with new solutions for old problems .
#Text=I believe that Canadians are looking for politicians with ideas and a vision for the future .
#Text=Canadians want a Prime Minister who cares about the future of Canada and cares about all Canadians .
#Text=I think Canadians are tired of the negative attack ads and rhetoric .
#Text=As you campaign around your riding , it 's likely that some issues are mentioned more often by voters , than other issues .
#Text=What would you say are the three hottest topics this election , in your riding ?
#Text=The Economy which would include job losses we have experienced and the ripple effect that has been felt as a result .
#Text=How well agriculture has been performing is also a part of our local economy here .
#Text=We have the third largest pork producing region in Canada .
#Text=Their industry has suffered greatly over the last few years .
#Text=The beef industry has also experienced hard times .
#Text=Agriculture is the largest movement of economic activity in and out of this riding daily .
#Text=1 in 3 jobs are tied to agriculture in this riding .
#Text=We have watched a large number of manufacturing jobs leave this riding over the last couple of years .
#Text=We have the local issue funding of the University of Waterloo Site in Stratford .
#Text=The Federal Government has not committed to the $ 10 million requested to assist with the project .
#Text=This is a contentious issue for local residents .
#Text=Funding of the University will have a profound economic effect on this region .
#Text=Arts and Culture is the second issue that has been brought up at the door .
#Text=Many are deeply concerned over the cuts to the programs in recent months .
#Text=They are also concerned about the future of Arts and Culture under the Harper government should he be successful in winning a majority government .
#Text=I have to say I have had a number of comments over the timing of the election and constituents not feeling that the election was necessary .
#Text=They would state that they felt that parliament was working and the election could have waited until the fixed date October 2009 .
#Text=Most are undecided in how to vote or there is a sense of voter apathy .
